Job.Version.Title.other: Event Based Job for replicating data for versioning

Job.Pruning.Title.other: Cleaning versions files for deleted nodes

Config.GroupSizes.MaxTotalSize.Label.other: Global size of all versions kept in this bucket

Config.GroupSizes.MaxTotalSize.Descripti.other: Limit the overall size taken. If limit is hit, oldest versions will be deleted. Use -1 for no limit

Config.GroupSizes.MaxSizePerFile.Label.other: Cumulated sizes for versions of one given file

Config.GroupSizes.MaxSizePerFile.Descrip.other: Limit the size taken by all versions of one file. If limit is hit, oldest versions will be deleted. Use -1 for no limit

Config.GroupSizes.IgnoreFilesGreaterThan.other: Do NOT version files with size greater than this limit. Use -1 for no limit

Config.GroupRetention.Description.other: Number of versions to keep per period

Config.GroupRetention.IntervalStart.Desc.other: Start point used for computing period. 0 is the time of the last version set, use another Period to set an limit

Config.GroupRetention.MaxNumber.Descript.other: Max number of versions to keep over this period. Use -1 to keep all versions, 0 to delete all.

Config.GroupRetention.NodeDeletedStrateg.other: Number of versions to keep after original file deletion.
